original_text:
The small and the great are there,
    and the slave is free from his master.
korean_text: 거기서는 작은 자와 큰 자가 함께 있고 종이 상전에게서 놓이느니라

sentences.original_text: The small and the great are there
sentences.korean_translation: 작은 자와 큰 자가 그곳에 있습니다

sentences.original_text: the slave is free from his master
